feed.title: Neuro Coder
feed.subtitle: A site about coding, neuroscience and occasional posts about games and IoT.

entry.title: IBM Watson analysis of literature
entry.content: In March I went to a talk by one of my colleagues at the Czech NIMH. He is a computer science major PhD student currently working for the IBM and focusing on games, emotions and cognitive sciences overall. He was giving a talk about IBM platform and how it can e to some extent used to decode human emotions and personality from a text. It sounded intriguing, so I immediately tried to give it a go.
entry.summary: In March I went to a talk by one of my colleagues at the Czech NIMH. He is a computer science major PhD student currently working for the IBM and focusing on games, emotions and cognitive sciences overall. He was giving a talk about IBM platform and how it can e to some extent used to decode human emotions and personality from a text. It sounded intriguing, so I immediately tried to give it a go.
